subject: Feature Suggestion: Resettable Max Pressure Readout
description_text:
Hi,

It would be really useful if, next to the current brake pressure readout in
the Simsonn Manager (and ideally also for throttle and clutch), you
included a resettable “max pressure/input” value.

This would allow us to do a few laps and see the peak pressure actually hit
during driving, rather than trying to guess what we think we’re doing in
the menu or under test conditions. Perfect for fine-tuning the “Max Force”
value or catching under/overbraking without needing to dig through
telemetry.

Simple button to reset max value, ideally per pedal.

Thanks – keep up the great work!
.
